boat.name: Windotter
boat.full_description:
Well presented family cruiser offered in fantastic condition all round with a good specification which includes, diesel heating hot water, all over cover and cockpit cover new 2020.
Powered by a single Yanmar 3Gm30 on shaft, serviced by main dealer summer 2020.
Gaff rigged with a lifting bowsprit.
Anchor Winch and winch to lower mast.
Upholstery in great condtion.
Features a fridge drawer, cocktail cabinet, cockpit table, plenty of underseat storage, hanging locker, electric lavac toilet.
Steel construction 5 berths.
Please contact for more detail and photos. lots of receipts for kit fitted over the last 3 years.
